snippet.title: The Lost Glitches | Fight For Memory - New 2024 Cinematic Game Trailer
snippet.description:
The Lost Glitches is Now Live on STEAM!

Get ready to dive into the immersive cyberpunk/tech-optimism universe of The Lost Glitches! Experience a groundbreaking Trading Card Game that combines tactical combat, deep RPG lore, and secure blockchain ownership. Build your deck, battle in epic PvP matches, and collect rare cards and exclusive cosmetics that are truly yours.

Created in partnership with ENVAR Studio: https://www.envarstudio.com

Play For Free On STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2782830/The_Lost_Glitches/
Play For Free on EPIC GAMES: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/the-lost-glitches-1bebe7

#glitched #indie #tcg #cinematic #trailer
